summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 30, Boren's Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue and 5th Avenue, between James Street and Cherry Street; by grading and paving the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7999 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
